title: Photon properties - how many photons in laser beam

content.question: A laser emits a beam of light with frequency <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>f</mi></mstyle></math> and a power (emitted energy per unit time) <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>P</mi></mstyle></math>. How many photons are emitted by the laser in a time interval <math alttext="delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="h f P delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi><mi>P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator h f, and denominator P delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator P delta t, and denominator h f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1 and denominator h f P delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi><mi>P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator P delta t, and denominator h f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
